Sukhavati: Divine Mother’s Embrace

Our true home where love flows as freely as light from the sun

There are moments, usually in the quiet hours before dawn, when the veil between worlds grows thin and we catch glimpses of something greater than our earthly understanding. Perhaps it’s the way morning mist transforms ordinary gardens into mystical realms, or how the first bird’s song seems to carry echoes of celestial music. In these moments, I often find my thoughts turning to Sukhavatiâ€”not as some distant paradise, but as our true home, the place our souls recognize even if our minds cannot yet fully comprehend it.
